page.title: 09Lord Denbigh.Interview
page.content: {Newnham Paddox}is owned by{Lord {Denbigh.}He owns just under 3,000 acres of land and most of that is covered by arable crops.Some of it is also covered with rough grazing where the cows eat.Some of the farmers on his land keep sheep. If Lord Denbigh had to move he would move somewhere sunny.Lord Denbigh is very interested in conservation and he is planning to make sure there's enough habitat for birds and to give cover from preditors. The Denbigh family have been living in the grounds from the year 1400. Lord Denbigh's family have been living on the estate for only four years because they used to live in Pailton House near Pailton. In Lord Denbigh's immediate family there are thirty relatives.
